messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Meadowfield Elemenatry
messages.msgSnippet: ... school! ... That must be scary!  It s common in our school districts too.  I guess it goes on everywhere. On a different note, has it been decided where
messages.messageBody:
> And it's the school that Duncan would be in if we sent him to public
school!
> ~Kelly

That must be scary! It's common in our school districts too. I guess it
goes on everywhere.

On a different note, has it been decided where the 2005 Live and Learn
Conference will be?

Thanks,
Anna

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Meadowfield Elemenatry
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/13/2004 1:59:30 PM Eastern Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: I just had to share this here.  This is from the town
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/13/2004 1:59:30 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
I just had to share this here. This is from the town where last years
unschooling conference was held. It's almost unbelievable. Anna
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

And it's the school that Duncan would be in if we sent him to public school!
~Kelly
